body:
Hi i am Jono and i am brining you guys here at avic.us an invite to my giveaway since i've been playing and have been enjoying it therefore i would like to let you all know of this giveaway i am holding to be sure that all you nice players who i have gamed with get a shot at winning a Cape, The steps are easy here is the link. :) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dr0P9SxO6Us
Best of luck!

replies.body:
I am not sure if this breaks any of YouTube's rules as I haven't even checked your video but you should read this if you haven't.

https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/1620498?hl=en

If you are breaking those rules on the above link then I suggest not doing the giveaway, changing the things that are breaking the rules and then doing it again. YouTube can suspend your account if they want to.
